website_summaries.verdict: A fun set of Joy-Con wheels that come with a guarantee from the company.
pros: Available in both black and red/black, and each set comes with 2 wheels
Controllers fit snugly into the wheels and the buttons are easy to press
Comes with a lifetime warranty against defects
cons: Some had occasional issues with the Switch not recognizing the Joy-Con while in the wheel

customer_reviews.title: Works...most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to play Mario Kart. For the most part the wheels work the way they are supposed to. Unfortunately, every now and then at least one will not work. You place the joy con in it and it doesn't recognize you are using the wheel...sucks for me because that's the only way I can win is with the wheel. Lol! Maybe it's user error, but we've all tried it when it isn't functioning properly. A day or 2 later it'll work just fine. Just annoying when it doesn't work though, that is why I deducted a star.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Q.

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to joycon
customer_reviews.text: You fall into one of two categories: You miss the glory days of using a similar wheel for Wii racing and want to recapture the feel of motion control racing, or you have gorilla hands, not enough controllers to go around and the thought of using your bear paws on a tiny joycon controller gives you nightmares. If you're either of these, this product will work for you. The wheel is still a bit to small for my tastes, but holding anything larger than a joycon works for me. The construction seems solid and did essentially what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: P4u1i0

customer_reviews.title: If you love Mario Kart on the Switch, this is a must
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect complement accessory for Mario Cart on the Nintendo Switch. It's a very simple product but It makes the game experience so much better. You stick your Joy-Cons into a compartment in the steering wheel and it provides you with a more realistic driving experience while still having easy access to all the buttons on the Joy-Con. the build quality is decent and it's definitely worth the $13 I paid because it has already provided days of quality gameplay for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: They do what they say and look good, but because the size of the controller is ...
customer_reviews.text: They do what they say and look good, but because the size of the controller is so small its makes it even more difficult to use than just the regular tiny remote.
customer_reviews.author: Ember Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great find!  Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great addition to my Switch. The controllers are held securely and my little one can hold the steering wheel without any problems. The top buttons have good movement and have stood up to my son and I playing Mario Kart just fine. I would recommend this product to anyone. It's an affordable, quality addition to anyone's Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: It makes the game flow so much better. The controllers snap in perfectly and really improves ...
customer_reviews.text: My roommate actually just bought a nintendo switch the day before I purchased this product. From playing Mario Kart with and without these controller wheels, my gameplay has improved dramatically. It makes the game flow so much better. The controllers snap in perfectly and really improves the gaming experience for me and my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Gibson

customer_reviews.title: I love these wheel
customer_reviews.text: I love these wheel.. Feels solid and very durable. My kid loves playing against me using the steering wheel. Very good investment that I would gladly make again
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cox

customer_reviews.title: Right size and big buttons!
customer_reviews.text: These are great controllers! They are easy to use, right sized, and the buttons are raised up enough that you can press them easily. Our family uses them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to play Mario Kart on your Switch!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these steering wheels for the Switch's Joy-Cons. They are small, but they work well with Mario Kart, and it's fun to use them instead of the standard Joy-Con or the Pro Controller. The buttons work nicely and overall I am very satisfied with these wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, final conclusion shall be this add-on wheel for NS controller is a must! With tiny controller for Mario Kart, it is just too not comfortable and not so natural. With this wheel add-on, you actually have a wheel to play with, it is easy and intuitive access to the game which making it's a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Q Chen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Received these in return for my honest review. Honestly took me a little bit to get used to them to actually enjoy it. Once I did get use to it they were really fun. Good quality especially at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim D. Nasab

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality is pretty good. It's very light with a smooth texture. It's much smaller than I expected but works well. Has a good feel to it when playing Mario Kart and doesn't slip if my hands get sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: goodtaste

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addiction to the Nintendo Switch. Makes playing Mario so much easier and more fun in my personal opinion. Very high quality and holds the controllers perfectly and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Akera

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The wheel are very good, the price is more valuable. The Joy-Cons fit nice and snug into the centre with absolutely zero movement so there is no fear of them falling out when not in us. There is not much travel in the trigger press either which is great for fast paced Mario Kart (faster reaction possible). Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Evendale

customer_reviews.title: Fun controller addition.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and fits young hands well. Controllers fit in easily and clicks in securely. Sturdy construction, so a drop won't break the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey N. Holtzman

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The joy cons fit perfectly. I love the red and blue wheels. They match the red and blue joy cons. I like the feel of these wheel controllers better than the Nintendo brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas French

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Cheap and fun to play Mario kart with
customer_reviews.author: Md

customer_reviews.title: Cute little accesory
customer_reviews.text: These little thing are pretty funny. They feel comfortable and responsive on my friend's Switch. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this when he plays Mario cart. Great product and price. I have 2 sets.
customer_reviews.author: tina myers

customer_reviews.title: Great addon for mario cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for mario cart. IF you love the game, you will enjoy it more with this near little joystick.
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Saklecha

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Great great great product! It is so much easier to play Mario kart 8 and smoke my boyfriend with the Joy-Con Wheel since the switch controllers are tiny and the pro controllers are pretty pricey so this is a great alt option. Totally recommend, great build, sturdy, and works well!
customer_reviews.author: CUBIAS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome steering wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Love these steering wheels for the switch. Kids loves it and adults as well. Recommended for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: We are in love!!
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loves these wireless controllers. Being huge fans of Mario Kart this was a welcome addition to our gaming equipment.
customer_reviews.author: mojohns721

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids can't get enough of these when using Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Love that it came with two wheels
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with two wheels. Very easy to use a must have if you have a Nintendo switch.
customer_reviews.author: ALL

customer_reviews.title: Good grip.
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid grip, perfectly packaged. Feels just like originals. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Just as the product describes. Love having these for the Nintendo switch Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Suggested Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I would not suggest this product. The L and R buttons stopped working after a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ash

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Product as described. Worked for my 5 year old playing mario kart.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: However it'd great and makes the game that much more fun and ...
customer_reviews.text: I know the switch remotes have to fit but I find the wheel a little small for adults. However it'd great and makes the game that much more fun and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love that it comes with two
customer_reviews.text: Well made product, love that it comes with two, my son enjoys it, easy to use once you get used to it!
customer_reviews.author: MomGJ

customer_reviews.title: Well built shipped quick Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue and red, it seems built very well and Im very happy for price I paid. My item arrived very quickly and our whole family is having hours of fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for racing games
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected but the controllers snap in nicely. It's a must have if you play MARIO kart. You'll love these!
customer_reviews.author: Live2race17

customer_reviews.title: good for cart 8
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a pair of wheels Switch is meant to be played with friends and these wheels are your best accessories for Mario Kart 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I received these Maxboost Joy-con Wheel free for review purposes and I must say I would have paid double the asking price for this product. The quality is great. Maxboost always makes awesome products at amazing prices for people like me who are always looking for a great deal. They fit the controllers very well and are a must have for racing with the Nintendo Switch. The buttons are responsive and we love the colors they offer. They are very comfortable for endless fun for our family. Don't have anything negative to say about this product. Super satisfied and I think any one would be with these.
customer_reviews.author: jesse staley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent item-well made easy to use- just what we needed-thanks so much for a great item
customer_reviews.author: james

product_meta.title: Maxboost Joy-Con Wheel for Nintendo Switch (2 Pack), Steering Wheel Accessory Attachment, Wheel Grip for Use With Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Controllers (Black 2 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

DESIGNED FOR NINTENDO SWITCH

Specially crafted to be used with Nintendo Switch's Joy-Con Controllers. (NOT INCLUDED: Joy-Con Controllers)


ENHANCED EXPERIENCE

Adds tons of fun to your behind the wheel experience in your favorite Nintendo Switch racing game.


EASY TO USE

Simply slide in your Joy-Con Controller into the designated slot. Fits BOTH left and right controllers.


EXTENDED BUTTONS

Easy to reach SL/SR extended buttons for added comfort and control.


LIFETIME WARRANTY

Guaranteed lifetime warranty from Maxboost to protect against defects.

ENHANCED EXPERIENCE: Adds tons of fun to your behind the wheel experience in your favorite Nintendo Switch racing game.
EASY TO USE: Simply slide in your Joy-Con Controller into the designated slot. Fits BOTH left and right controllers.
EXTENDED BUTTONS: Easy to reach SL/SR extended buttons for added comfort and control
LIFETIME WARRANTY - Guaranteed lifetime warranty from Maxboost to protect against defects.
